text: oru pen tan kanavan tannai veruttu vituvan enro allatu purakkanittu vituvan enro payantal, avarkal iruvarum tankalukkul (camatanamana) oru mutivaic ceytu kontal avviruvar mitu kurramillai. Attakaiya camataname melanatu. Innum, anmakkal karumittanattirku utpattavaiyakinrana. Avvaru utpatamal) oruvarukkoruvar upakaram ceytu, (allahvukkup) payantu natappirkalanal niccayamaka allah ninkal ceypavarraiyellam nanku arintavanaka irukkinran
